title.narrative: 07-02- DATA COLLECTION SYSTEM

description.narrative: By the end of 2017, data collection systems and mechanisms for monitoring of social indicators are functional and responsive to equity, gender and human rights. A framework for monitoring and evaluation of equity is implemented and measures the lifting of barriers and bottlenecks limiting the improvement of living conditions of children and women., which contributes to Building Capacity For Evaluation, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Cross-Sectoral Planning And Programme Reviews, Evaluation And Research, Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Social Protection. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2017, economic and social policies and programs are result-focused, monitored, evaluated and disseminated and contribute to reducing disparities, vulnerability and child poverty and to the consolidation of peace.

PF4C - domestic revenue mobilization and access to finance for key social services

Stimulating demand for and capacity to use data

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2017, data collection systems and mechanisms for monitoring of social indicators are functional and responsive toequity, gender and human rights. A framework for monitoring and evaluation of equity is implemented and measures the lifting ofbarriers and bottlenecks limiting the improvement of living conditions of children and women.

description.narrative: UNICEF supported the production of a number of studies, evaluations and surveys. The 2016 MICS (first national post-Ebola survey) provided updated and disaggregated data for major social indicators related to women and children, and served as baseline for major indicators of the PNDS 2016-2020, the new UNDAF and CPD. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:29/12/2016

title.narrative: Number of global situation analysis on children and women, and Gender-sensitive, human rights sensitive and equity-sensitive carried out and disseminated

actual.value: 2015:1 SITAN completed.The situation analysis-SITAN- of children and women conducted in 2012 has been updated in 2015 and played a key role to feed the Mid Term Review of the country programme.

title.narrative: Number of studies, surveys, evaluations carried out, updating knowledge at national and regional

actual.value: 2015:15 studies, 5 evaluations and 3 surveys were completed in 2015 and enhanced to generate evidences which informed the situation analysis with a focus on the impact of Ebola Virus disease.

title.narrative: National database DevInfo (Stat-Guinee-Info) functional and available online

actual.value: 2015:The national database named StatGuineeInfo has been created and is being fed with data. Its official launch is expected on December 2015. 20 statisticians from national and regional level were trained in Devinfo
